Description: Limestone funerary bust; lappet-wig and a beard.
Curator's comments: Published: J. L. Keith, Anthropoid Busts of Deir el Medineh and Other Sites and Collections (DIFAO 49, 2011), p. 328.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010/11 Oct-Mar, Leiden, National Museum Of Antiquities, Egyptian Magic
